title: How can i switch my acc server in oce to Korean server
body:
Hi i’m planing to visit Korea for 2 months and half after 30 of nov and i have don’t not have a acc in Korean server. There is non switching system in league of legends to Korean server. But we can switch server to anyother server except Korean server.. with the shop. 
May i switch my acc server to Korean server please? On 30 of nov. until 1 Feb pls. 
Thank you

replies.body: Nope. You're not a korean citizen.

I don't believe there's any way to transfer accounts to or from the Korean servers. A Korean account has to be linked to Korean citizenship so they run on a slightly different account creation and management system than regular/unrestricted accounts do.

As far as I know this holds true even if you have a Korean citizenship and an account on another region you wish to transfer. You'd have to create a new account to use on the KR server.

You can ask player support for more details, but I wouldn't get your hopes up: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
